faculties_accepted: School of Architecture , Civil and Environment Engineering
School of Computer and Communication Sciences
School of Engineering Sciences and Techniques
College of Humanities (only 1 module – students would have to take a majority of their modules from other schools)
module_restrictions: The courses and projects listed here are not accessible to exchange students. Exchange students can take courses on the Master level, but they have to meet the pre-requisites. Incoming Bachelor students are advised to take courses starting with 2xxx or 3xxx.
visa_info: If you need a visa, the visa application must be submitted at least 3 months prior to the start of your study curriculum by means of the appropriate visa application form. All students are advised to apply for the necessary visa immediately after they received the official offer letter/email from their host university. Foreign nationals who are not EU/EFTA citizens and who do not require a visa should consult the Swiss embassy or consulate in their country for the current entry and residence requirements and formalities.
accommodations_info: Accommodation is guaranteed for NUS students. EPFL books rooms on behalf of the students. Students will be offered room’s proposal directly from the FMEL.
cost_of_living: The estimated monthly living expenses in Switzerland are CHF2,000. This includes accommodation costs of CHF600 - CHF800, food costs of CHF600, transport costs of CHF60, insurance costs of CHF90, and other expenses such as entertainment and clothes amounting to CHF450.
